Transcription for 1221876

Can you tell me what being Jewish means to you? Can you answer that?
You see, I am a political Jew, I'm not a religious Jew.
I believe that the Jews went through a very, very difficult time, and I have an argument with my God.
I say to him that he didn't do it well, that he didn't behave well towards the Jews.
And particularly when I think of my friends in Prague who perished, and my family who perished, I said he behaved very badly.
